Package org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.impl

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationFrameworkLayer
    This class is a singelton aimed at share the the Application Framework Layer
    status of the ZigBee Base Drier among all the ZigBeeEndpoint register by it.

    In particular, this class tracks the Transaction Id and the Active End Point
    on the hardware providing access to ZigBee Network (currently the Texas Instrument CC2480)
    ClusterMessageImpl  
    NetworkStateSerializer
    NetworkStateSerializer serializes and deserializes the ZigBeeNetworkState.
    WaitForClusterResponse
    This class register itself as ApplicationFrameworkMessageConsumer to the given ApplicationFrameworkMessageProducer
    and it wait for a matching AF_INCOMING_MSG.
    ZigBeeEndpointImpl  
    ZigBeeNetwork  
    ZigBeeNodeImpl  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ZigBeeBasedriverTimeOutException  
    ZigBeeException
    Root exception for all the code related to ZigBee
    the BaseDriver should use ZibeeBasedriverException by including
    communication exception as nested Throwable

    The ZCL bundle should use ZigBeeClusterException
    and HA Drive should use ZigBeeDeviceException.
    ZigBeeNetworkManagerException
